## Contribute

Issue Tracker: <https://gitlab.com/rocshers/python/aiogram-sentry/-/issues>  
Source Code: <https://gitlab.com/rocshers/python/aiogram-sentry>

Before adding changes:

```bash
make install-dev
```

After changes:

```bash
make format test
```
